sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"支持，支援，拥护"之意。
means: back ： 通常指对论点、行动、事业等的强有力支持。
uphold ： 既可指积极努力对陷入困境者的支持，也可指给某人在行动、道义或信仰上的支持。
support ： 含义广泛，多指在道义上或物质上支持某人，也可指对某项事业的支持。
sustain ： 侧重指连续不断的支持。
advocate ： 多指通过写文章或发表演说等来支持或拥护，往往暗示提倡某事或为某事辩护。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"经历，经受，遭受"之意。
means: undergo ： 多指经受艰难、痛苦、不愉快或危险等事。
experience ： 指亲身经受或体验某事。
sustain ： 指遭受痛苦或承受负担。
suffer常可与sustain通用，尤指受到损害或伤害。

sentence.Network_en: There's a sufficiency of drama in these lives to sustain your interest.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些人的生活充满了戏剧性，总能让你兴趣盎然。

sentence.Network_en: Their defense markets are too small to sustain economically viable production runs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的国防市场太小，就经济可行性而言不足以维持生产。

sentence.Network_en: The people who sustain the worst losses are usually those who overreach.
sentence.Network_cn: 不自量力者往往摔得最惨。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French soustenir, from Latin sustinere, from sub- 'from below' + tenere 'hold'

entry.def: If you sustain something, you continue it or maintain it for a period of time.

example.ex: But he has sustained his fierce social conscience from young adulthood through old age...
example.tran: 而他从青年时期一直到老年都始终保持着强烈的社会良知。

example.ex: The parameters within which life can be sustained on Earth are extraordinarily narrow.
example.tran: 地球上生命可以存活下来的地域范围是非常狭小的。

entry.def: If you sustain something such as a defeat, loss, or injury, it happens to you.

example.ex: Every aircraft in there has sustained some damage...
example.tran: 那里的每架飞机都受到了一些损坏。

example.ex: A seventeen-year-old tourist died late last night of injuries sustained in yesterday's bomb blast.
example.tran: 一位 17 岁的游客在昨天的炸弹爆炸中受伤并于当天深夜身亡。

entry.def: If something sustains you, it supports you by giving you help, strength, or encouragement.

example.ex: The cash dividends they get from the cash crop would sustain them during the lean season...
example.tran: 从经济作物中获得的收益能帮助他们度过不景气的时期。

example.ex: I am sustained by letters of support and what people say to me in ordinary daily life...
example.tran: 这些支持的信件和人们每天对我的鼓励一直支撑着我。

means.word_mean: 1. lengthen or extend in duration or space;

sentences.sentence: "We sustained the diplomatic negociations as long as possible"
"She suffered a fracture in the accident"
"He had an insulin shock after eating three candy bars"
"She got a bruise on her leg"
"He got his arm broken in the scuffle"
"We sustained ourselves on bread and water"
"This kind of food is not nourishing for young children"
"The money will sustain our good cause"
"There's little to earn and many to keep"

means.word_mean: 5. be the physical support of; carry the weight of;

sentences.sentence: "He supported me with one hand while I balanced on the beam"

means.word_mean: 7. establish or strengthen as with new evidence or facts;

auth_sentence.content: That will help sustain the movement, Shifter said.
auth_sentence.res_content: That will help sustain the movement, Shifter said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That will help sustain the movement, Shifter said.

auth_sentence.content: I believe things that adopt to changes will sustain.
auth_sentence.res_content: I believe things that adopt to changes will sustain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I believe things that adopt to changes will sustain.

auth_sentence.content: Humanity and the earth cannot sustain another war.
auth_sentence.res_content: Humanity and the earth cannot sustain another war.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Humanity and the earth cannot sustain another war.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易受感染的,易受影响的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sus在……下面+cept拿+ible可..的→能被拿下→易受影响
sus在……下面+cept拿+ive……的→有拿下的能力→有接受力的
sus在……下面+ten支撑+ance表名词→支撑下去的东西→粮食;坚持
sus在……下面+spect看→在下面看一看→suspect怀疑
sus在……下面+pend挂→挂在下面→悬挂
sus在……下面+pens挂+e→一颗心挂着
sus在……下面+spir呼吸+e→喝望
sus在……下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =hold,表示"拿住,握住,支撑"; 2. 挽留

stems_affixes.word_buile: attain[v.达到;获得]+able可以……的→adj.可到达的,可得到的
pertain[[v.属于,关于]]男→adj.恰当的;有关的
contain包含,容纳+er表名词→n.容器;集装箱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演
stems_affixes.word_buile: entertain娱乐,招待+ment表名词→n.款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
stems_affixes.word_buile: retain[[v.适合,保持,保留]]→n.保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
attain[v.达到;获得]+ment表名词→n.完成,成就
at加强动作+tain拿住→获得

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包含,容纳;容忍,抑制;可被……除尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+tain拿住,握住,支撑→全部拿住→包含,容纳
de加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿住,拿下→拘留

stems_affixes.value_cn: 娱乐, 招待, 接受, 怀抱
stems_affixes.word_buile: enter进入,走进+tain挽留→使……挽留→休息,娱乐

stems_affixes.value_cn: 维修,保养,维持,供养,坚持,主张,支持
stems_affixes.word_buile: main=man+tain拿住,握住,支撑→用手拿住→坚持
ob加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿到,获得
per始终+tain拿住,握住,支撑→始终拿着→属于,关于
re回来+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿回来→保留
sus下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑

Sentence.sentence: marriages are hard to sustain without social or family pressures
The problem is that such an impulse is hard to sustain Across the country, many similar families were unable to maintain the initial boost in morale(士气).
It cannot be sustained when friends move far apart.
In its 1994 report, the World Bank argued that the current pension system in most countries could not be sustained in the long term.
not be sustained in the long term

means.word_mean: 支撑，支持；承受…的压力(或重量)

sentences.en: These four posts sustain the entire building.
sentences.cn: 这四根柱子支撑着整座建筑物。
一种不可动摇的信念支持着我。

sentences.en: During the war we had just enough food to sustain us.
sentences.cn: 战争期间, 我们的食物仅够维持生活。

means.word_mean: 长期保持; 使继续;  使保持; 使稳定持续

sentences.en: We do not have enough money to sustain our campaign for long.
sentences.cn: 我们没有足够的财力使宣传活动长期保持下去。

means.word_mean: 经受, 遭受, 蒙受

sentences.en: How long will you sustain the rudeness of your boss?
sentences.cn: 对你上司的粗暴无礼你还能忍受多久?

means.word_mean: 给…以力量(或勇气、信心等)，鼓励，使振作

sentences.en: Sustained by you,I, at long last, finished my work.
sentences.cn: 在你的支持鼓舞下，我终于完成了这部作品。

sentences.en: I am in charge of sustaining the first-aid centre with blood plasma.
sentences.cn: 我负责为急救中心供应血浆。

jushi.english: The trucking company was able to sustain the severe fuel shortage.
jushi.chinese: 该卡车公司能经受得了这严重的汽油短缺。

jushi.english: His comforting words helped to sustain me in my faith during those dark days.
jushi.chinese: 在那黑暗的日子里,他的安慰支持了我的信念。

jushi.english: She was sustained by pride in her family.
jushi.chinese: 对家庭的自豪感支持着她。
